DDL.statement: CREATE VIEW `view_journeys` AS select `APP_JOURNEY`.`JOURNEY_REF` AS `JOURNEY_REF`, `APP_JOURNEY`.`STATUS` AS `STATUS`, `APP_JOURNEY`.`DESPATCH_NO` AS `DESPATCH_NO`, `APP_JOURNEY`.`TIMESLOT` AS `TIMESLOT`, `APP_JOURNEY`.`LOCATION_ID_TO` AS `LOCATION_ID_TO`, `APP_JOURNEY`.`DATE_UPDATED` AS `DATE_UPDATED`, `APP_JOURNEY`.`LOAD_TYPE` AS `LOAD_TYPE`, `APP_JOURNEY`.`LOAD_TYPE_DESC` AS `LOAD_TYPE_DESC`, `APP_JOURNEY`.`HAULIER` AS `HAULIER`, concat(`APP_JOURNEY`.`TIMESLOT`,' ',rpad(`APP_JOURNEY`.`LOAD_TYPE`,10,' '),' ',rpad(`APP_JOURNEY`.`LOAD_TYPE_DESC`,20,' '),rpad(`APP_JOURNEY`.`HAULIER`,20,' ')) AS `DESCRIPTION` from `APP_JOURNEY` where (`APP_JOURNEY`.`STATUS` = 'Unassigned') AND (`APP_JOURNEY`.`JOURNEY_REF` <> 'NO JOURNEY') ;
